Name: Square Tea Table: Friendly Welcome
Desc: This proper and elegant square wooden table is made from affordable and durable Fragrant Cedar Wood, and is often found in the teahouses around Yilong Wharf. It is so named because it can seat guests on all four sides.\nRumors say that having been washed with tea water for so long has caused them to absorb the essence of the tea leaves, preventing cracking and making the table shinier and giving it a light tea fragrance over time. Such rumors even attracted the attention of buyers from numerous other nations.\nBut in reality, the luster of tables and chairs depends entirely on constant care and maintenance by the staff, and there's no silver bullet to magically solve everything... Also, it would truly be a waste if guests spilled too much tea on the table...
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
